Salsat toum ma ọ bụ toumya (nkwupụta Arabic nke 'galik') bụ ngwongwo galik a na-ahụkarị na Levant

Dị ka Provençal aioli, enwere ọtụtụ ọdịiche, otu a na-ahụkarị nwere galik, nnu, mmanụ oliv ma ọ bụ mmanụ akwụkwọ nri, na mmiri lemon, nke a na etinye ọnụ site na iji ụrọ osisi na pestle. Enwekwara ọdịiche a ma ama n'ọtụtụ ebe, dị ka obodo Zgharta, na Lebanọn, ebe a na etinyekwa mint; a na-akpọ ya zeit wa toum ('mmanụ na galik').
A na-eji toum salsat (galik sauce) eme ihe dị ka dip, ọkachasị na fries, ọkụkọ na artichoke, na sandwiches Levantine, ọkachasị ndị nwere ọkụkọ
A na-ejikarị ya na nri ọkụkọ e siri esi.
